data.title: The climate of Burgersdorp and the best time to visit
data.meta_description: Discover the climate of Burgersdorp. Read about average temperatures, rainfall, and the ideal months to visit.
data.text:
What’s the climate like in Burgersdorp?

The current climate in Burgersdorp features temperatures ranging from a high of 30°C to a low of 17°C throughout the year. The average yearly temperature is around 25°C. At night, temperatures in the colder months average around -1°C and in the warmer months around 14°C.

The highest temperature recorded in Burgersdorp in recent years was 41°C in January 2016. The lowest daytime temperature recorded was 5°C in July 2016.

On average, Burgersdorp receives 537 mm of rainfall each year. For comparison, New York gets 833 mm of rainfall annually.

Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Temp. max (°C) 30 29 27 23 20 17 17 19 24 26 28 30 Rainfall Rainfall (mm) 83 106 76 45 20 10 17 6,3 17 26 50 80

Click on the month name to see more weather details, like daily averages, temperatures, and precipitation for the past years in that month.

The best time to visit Burgersdorp for sunny weather is January through May and August through December. During this period, you'll have good temperatures and not too much rain, making it a great time to visit Burgersdorp. In the other months of the year, there's too much rain or the temperature isn't ideal for a visit if you want sunny and pleasant weather.

Discover cheap trips to Burgersdorp

Climate Table of Burgersdorp

The climate table of Burgersdorp shows the average temperatures, rainfall, and UV index per month. The table gives an overview of the average day and night temperatures in degrees Celsius, the total amount of rainfall in millimetres, the total snowfall in centimetres, and the UV index for each month. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it's snow or hail.

Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Temp. max (°C) 30 29 27 23 20 17 17 19 24 26 28 30 Temp. min (°C) 14 14 12 8 4 0 0 1 5 9 10 13 Rainfall Rainfall (mm) 83 106 76 45 20 10 17 6,3 17 26 50 80 UV Index 9 9 9 7 6 6 6 7 8 10 10 10

Click on the month name to see more weather details, like daily averages, temperatures, and precipitation for the past years in that month.

Average yearly temperature: 25°C

Highest temperature: 30°C in January and December

Lowest temperature: 17°C in June and July

Precipitation: 537 mm per year, averaging 45 mm per month

Driest months: 6,3 mm in August, 10 mm in June and 17 mm in July

Wettest months: 106 mm in February, 83 mm in January and 80 mm in December

Average Temperature per Month in Burgersdorp

This graph shows the average maximum temperatures per month in Burgersdorp, South Africa. The temperatures are shown in degrees Celsius and the average is calculated based on the recorded temperatures per month from past years.

Average Rainfall per Month in Burgersdorp

This graph shows how much rainfall Burgersdorp, South Africa gets on average per month. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it's snow or hail. This makes it easy to compare how much has fallen, regardless of the form of precipitation. The amount of rainfall is measured in millimetres and the average is calculated based on the recorded rainfall per month from past years.

Average UV Index per Month in Burgersdorp

This graph shows the average UV index per month in Burgersdorp, South Africa. The UV index indicates the intensity of ultraviolet radiation and ranges from 0 to a maximum of 11.

Yearly Temperature in Burgersdorp

This graph shows the average yearly temperature in Burgersdorp, South Africa. The yearly temperature, expressed in degrees Celsius, is the average of all twelve monthly temperatures summed up for that year.

Total Yearly Rainfall in Burgersdorp

This chart shows the total yearly rainfall in Burgersdorp, South Africa over the past few years. The total yearly rainfall, measured in centimetres, is the sum of all the rain that fell in the twelve months of that year.
